MailTemp.Subject: GE Fingerprints | Email Updated
MailTemp.Body:
Hi $Name$,
Your login email ID for GE Fingerprints system has been changed.
Previous Email: $Emailidold$
New updated Email: $Emailidnew$
If you did not request the change, kindly contact application administrator. If it was you, you can proceed with these updated details.
If you have any questions or need support, email us at support@gefingerprints.com
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
